uvs.picture_fi: This used small Toy Hauler is in excellent condtion, basically its like getting a new 2014 at used price! Looks like it just rolled of the showroom floor! Beautiful Cherry Wood Cabinetry throughout the unit. Queen size bed, Full Bathroom with power vent, Living amenities include double door refrigerator, stove w/ stove top cover, an oven, microwave with an exhaust hood, large kitchen sink with detachable faucet in an rubbed oil bronze color. AM/FM/CD Stereo, 19" LCD TV. (2) opposing sofas with a table in between that can be converted to a bed for extra sleeping! Some of the extra features are tie downs on the flooring, pleated shades, exhaust vents on both side walls, Diamond Shield to protect from rock damage and A power tongue jack w/light. It only weighs 4612lbs. Perfect for a SUV or 1/2 ton truck to pull!
This Class A is on a Ford Chassis V10 Gas. It offers plenty of space for everyone to sleep with an Electric Bunk over the Drivers Area and two Bunks on a Slide, perfect for those long trips!

This class A is on a Ford Chassis V10 Gas, and has plenty to offer. An electric drop down bunk for additional sleeping capacity, also the hidden pull out pantry provides extra countertop space in all models.
This Class A is on a Ford Chassis V10 Gas. It offers plenty of space for everyone to sleep with an Electric Bunk over the Drivers Area and two Bunks on a Slide, perfect for those long trips!

This class A is on a Ford Chassis V10 Gas, and has plenty to offer. An electric drop down bunk for additional sleeping capacity, also the hidden pull out pantry provides extra countertop space in all models.

This very spacious Pursuit features abundant countertop and strategically located storage area that allow you to bring along all the comforts of home. Also features an electric drop-down bunk for additional sleeping capacity.
This unit is perfect for those couples looking for a light weight camper! With a large Bathroom, Walk Around Bed and An Outside Kitchen for outside entertainment. Dry Weight 4,670lbs!
This unit features a Rear Bathroom, optimal Solid Surface Countertop Space. An Outside Kitchen for outdoor entertaining! Dry Weight 5,200lbs
The Kids have a space of their own, an entertainment center with an upper bunk. A versatile kids lounge/futon and a flip up bunk. Outside is an Exterior Kitchen! Dry Weight 6,700lbs!
This unit features A large Rear Bathroom with A Glass Shower, A Dinette that breaks down to a size of a twin bed and A TV that swivels from living area to Bedroom. Dry Weight 4,735lbs!

This open design features two double sized bunks, a full slide length sofa/dinette, and has a raised bar that defines the kitchen for the entry area along with additional countertop space! Dry Weight 5,315lbs!
This Toy Hauler is 1/2 ton towable with a Dry Weight 5025lbsl! Plenty of open space for cargo and living space and retractable screen on the ramp door.
This unit features a Rear Bathroom with A Full Size Walk In Linen Closet! Optimal Solid Surface Countertop Space! Dry Weight 5,200lbs
This unit features A Rear Bathroom, with a living area with two opposing slides to give an open area with a Kitchen Island, U-shaped Dinette and A Very Deep Pantry Closet.. Dry Weight 5555lbs!!
This unit features A Rear Bathroom with Kitchen Island, A U-Shaped Dinette and A Very Deep Pantry Closet.

This unit features a Bunkhouse with a Kitchen Island and An Outdoor Kitchen as well. The bunkhouse room has 3 bunks and a dinette for the kids that turns into a bed, Solid door that seperates the living area from the kids room! Dry Weight 6,105lbs

This Toy Hauler features a 9ft Seperate Garage with a Queen Lift Bed. A Pass-thru Bathroom. Check out the massive U-Dinette, perfect for entertaining and converts to even more sleeping space. Dry Weight only 5,695lbs!

This unit lightweight trailer by Shadow Cruiser is the easiest-towing, best value in travel trailers. It is their original lightweight! The Dry weight is on 5,700lbs. If you're looking for sleeping up to 9 and a floor plan that is functional, look no further! It features (1) slide, barreled interior ceiling which adds a lot of head room. It has a walk around full size queen bed 60 x80 (where most brands are 60 x 74 beds) with underneath storage, and privacy is unique too, because most have curtains to section it off, this unit uses hard doors for complete privacy! And notice the plush leather sofa, glazed cabinet doors, Super-Booth 48" dinette. It has a full kitchen with a (3) burner stove top, an oven, a microwave with an exhaust hood and a nice double door refrigerator. The bath features a full sized tub for the kids. Also hand-made medicine cabinet, not cheap plastic. The Bunkhouse features a kid's dinette that converts to a bed, also has a fold-up bunk above, as well as a solid door versus the curtain for privacy. Some of the exterior features are; a small outdoor kitchen with a pull out propane (2) stove top and sink, as well as a small refrigerator, power awning, slam latch storage compartment doors, outdoor speakers and Aerodynamic-framed construction and the industry's strongest laminated crowned roof.

This unit features a Bunkhouse with a Kitchen Island and An Outdoor Kitchen as well. The bunkhouse room has 3 bunks and a dinette for the kids that turns into a bed, Solid door that seperates the living area from the kids room! Dry Weight 6,105lbs

This unit features A Rear Living Floorplan with a Party Deck on the Rear with sliding glass doors for access. The living area consist of two recliners, Hide-Bed Sofa, Entertainment Center, Free Standing Dinette and A Kitchen Island. Full Bathroom with walk-in shower w/seat. Dry Weight 12,733lbs.

This unit features Rear Living Floorplan with two opposing slides! Two lounge chairs in the rear with big picture window, a 70" hide-a-bed sofa, free standing dinette, entertaiment center and A Kitchen Island! Bathroom has a Walk-in Shower w/seat! The Masterbedroom features a slide with a wardrobe closet. Dry Weight 9,100lbs.

This unit features the Bunkhouse Floorplan with two opposing slides to give ample room for the kids/guest and a full wall wardrobe. It also features plenty of seating in the living area with a 70" sofa and a full slide theater seating. The kitchen also features large refrigerator, panty and kitchen island. A full bathroom with a walk-in shower w/seat. Also features the Exterior Kitchen for that outdoor entertaining, with bumper mount swivel gas grill. Dry Weight 12,379lbs.

Here's a super nice used motorhome on a Ford Chassis, a Triton V10 engine and only 14,000 miles. It has the LCI Electronic Leveling System, A Voyager built in back up monitor, A 6500 Guardian RV generator with only 132 hours. Raise Panel Cherry Cabinets. Two opposing sleeper sofas and a dinette booth which also converts into a bed for extra sleeping room. You can sleep up to 8 people in this RV! It has a full kitchen with several drawers and cabinets for storage. This floor plan has a side aisle full bathroom with another set of cabinets for linen and towel storage. Across from the bathroom is large hallway closet with more drawers and wardrobe for hanging clothes. In the rear of the coach it has a walk around queen bed with a wardrobe for yet more clothes storage. Honestly this is a very nice motorhome.

Here's a super nice 2015 Forest River Forester 2251SLEC. This motor home is on a Ford Chassis with a Triton V10 engine. It has the power package with power windows, power door locks, tilt wheel, cruise control an AM/FM/CD player and tan leather accented drivers and passengers seats. This Forester has a lot of nice features such as, the cab over is two bunks for additional sleeping arrangements.It has a 32" TV on a swing arm for entertainment. It has pull down day/night privacy shades, a ducted roof A/C, solid Cherry Wood raised panel cabinets, a dinette booth in which it converts into a bed for extra sleeping room allowing the Forester to sleep up to 6 people. It has a full kitchen with a (3) burner stove top with cover, an oven, a microwave oven with an exhaust hood, a single stainless steel sink, a counter top extension, and a double door refer with matching raised panel Cherry Wood fronts. This 2251 has an adult size shower with glass enclosure and a skylight in a private bathroom with a foot flush toilet. A sink/vanity, mirrored medicine cabinet which is one the outside of the bathroom in the bedroom.. In the rear is a walk around queen bed on a slide and cabinets for extra storage. On the exterior of the unit it has a slide topper on the slide out, it has an electric awning, a 4000 watt Onan micro quiet generator, several exterior storage compartments, it has the black framed tinted safety glass windows, a class III receiver hitch, 30amp service, an exterior shower and a rear ladder!

This unit features the CampFire Cafe an Outdoor Kitchen. A bunkhouse with a slide to give the little campers plenty room. Hidden hand held device (Phone, IPad, Tablets, etc) charging station (gets items off the countertop). Dry Weight 7,010lbs
Small but not basic! Features a full kitchen and bathroom, comfortable dinette with reversable cushions to change up your decor and LCD TV. A 60 x 75 queen bed. Dry Weight 3,340lbs!!

This Toy Hauler model includes all the amenities of home along with a 10' garage. The garage area includes an available power bed that lowers for addtional sleeping space. The full kitchen includes appliances, cabinet storage, double sink, and an oversize U-Shaped Dinette. The Murphy Bed type designed bedroom provides comfortable seating during the day! Dry Weight 6,640lbs
This unit features the Rear Bathroom Floorplan with A Kitchen Island! It also features a 82" sofa, large dinette and the Campfire Cafe an outdoor kitchen! Dry Weight 6700lbs!

Small but not basic, with many features Sonic does not disappoint with full bathroom and kitchen, comfortable dinette and elevated LCD TV gives this ULTRA-lightweight a heavyweight punch. Dry Weight 3560lbs!

Small but not basic, the Sonic adds value to the Ultra-lightweight market with many features such as full bathroom and kitchen. A comfortable versatile dinette that breaks down to a bunk with a bunk above. Dry Weight 3350lbs!

This Rear Living Room features not only the two lounge chairs and big picture window but also A Fireplace and Desk. The Kitchen features Corian Solid Surface Countertops! Dry Weight 9,520lbs!

Here's a really nice Rear Lounge Floor Plan, it's absolutely beautiful! It has (3) slide outs and a ton of interior room!! The main living area is HUGE!! It has (2) opposing slides! It features a Free Standing Dinette with (4) Chairs and (2) Upgraded Rocker Recliners, as well as the L-Shaped lounge with the hide-a-bed sofa and matching ottoman with an electric Fireplace as well as a 32" TV with the AM/FM/CD/DVD player with outside speakers! The kitchen is very spacious with a reversed L-shaped counter top and full galley equipped with a (3) burner stove top, an oven, a microwave with an exhaust hood and 8 cu. Ft. Refrigerator. The entire rear of this coach is beautiful Cherry cabinets and Corian Solid Surface Countertops space! It has a queen bed slide in the master bedroom, which not only gives you a dresser at the foot of the bed; it also gives you full height wardrobe. This floor plan also has a very nice side aisle bathroom with a Neo angled shower with a glass shower surround. The outside has a couple of nice features as well, they are a LP quick connect, a power awning, slam latch baggage doors, the slide out bike/storage rack, plus it has pass through storage with entertainment hook ups. This unit also features the Cougar Remote System, where you can put your slides and awning out from the truck all by a remote! Dry Weight 10,170lbs.
This unit features A Bunkhoue with dual opposing slides a 1/2 bath, plenty room for the little campers with A Hide-A-Bed Sofa on each slide and Fold Down Bunks as well! Dry Weight 12,160lbs
***SOLD***

One of the lightest high end 5th wheel on the planet and it features a rear living room with beautiful large picture window with residential wood blinds to give that cozy feel! Two Leather Recliners and hide-a-bed sofa by Lane Furniture! Definitely gives that at home feel! Free standing dinette with (4) chairs, the entertainment center includes a beautiful electric fireplace and 32" LCD TV with an AM/FM/CD/DVD player. A desk, with a chair and two file cabinet drawers. Beautiful Glazed Cherry Cabinetry throughout the unit! A Ceiling Fan. If you're wanting a huge kitchen with tons of cabinets and a lot of counter top space, then this 343RL fits the bill! It has a (3) burner stove top with cover, an oven, a microwave with an exhaust hood and a huge (4) door side by side refrigerator with matching Cherry Raised Panel Wood. The countertops are solid surface! It has a queen bed slide in the master bedroom with a full height double door wardrobe prepped for a washer and dryer. A 19"bedroom TV. The bathroom has a Elegant Glass Bowl Sink on top of the countertop, Neo Angled Glass Shower. The exterior features are frameless automotive style windows; high gloss Grey Exterior, Aluminum Wheels with MorRyde suspension. Electric 4 Point Leveling System. Slide Awning Package-Quad Slides. Aluminum Folding Steps. Dry Weight 9,940lbs.

This unit features a 12' Cargo Area, TV, W/D Prep, Patio Door. Inside features are A 12cf Refrigerator, Hi-Top Booth, 46" TV, Fireplace. A TV in the Bedroom with a Residential Queen Bed. Dry Weight 14,480lbs!!

If you're looking for all the comfort features of the Fuzion but don't necessarily need all the extras then Impact by Fuzion is the one for you! The floor plan is the exact same as the Fuzion FZ310. It has the 10' Cargo Area with the two opposing sofa's that fold down to a double size bed, along with double bed on top, both are on an electric lift. A pull down screen wall for when the cargo door is open. It has the double sliding glass doors that separate the cargo area from the living area. In the living area there is Theater Style Seating with recliners, beautiful Hardwood Cherry Cabinetry throughout the unit. The kitchen consists of (3) burner stove top, an oven, and microwave with an exhaust hood, an 8 cu ft. refrigerator, and a nice size pantry with several shelves. It has a side aisle bathroom with a radius shower with a pull glass enclosure, sink with vanity. The Doors leading into the bathroom and master bedroom are real cherry entry doors! The master bedroom is a north to south walk around King-size bed with a nice size wardrobe slide! A 19" bedroom TV! The exterior features are Lighted Power Awning, a fueling station, complete pass thru storage, Braced for 2nd A/C in Cargo area. Dry Weight 10,860lbs

This Keystone Impact by Fuzion features a very spacious living area because of the (2) opposing slide outs with an entertainment center with a 32" TV and AM/FM/CD/DVD stereo. Theater Style Sofa with Recliners. In the kitchen it has a huge counter top that extends from the rear bathroom wall with a ton of extra storage and double sink, (3) burner stove top, an oven, microwave and refrigerator. The floor plan offers a loft bed that you can access from the living area. It has a 36" entry door to the garage area which is 12' long. It has a bath in the garage and the double power bed and dual opposing sofas for extra sleeping room. The master bedroom has a north to south walk around queen bed with a huge wardrobe slide that actually extends into the master bath as a linen closet. The exterior features are electric awning, prepped for generator, full pass thru storage, TV Bracket and connections on Exterior wall. Fuel Pump Station for carrying fuel for the toys! Dry Weight 12,560lbs.
***SOLD***

This unit features bunkhouse floorplan with two 28 x 74 bunks in the rear with A large radius dinette and plush highback visonary sofa. 9" Single basin kitchen sink. Swivel Tv Entertainment Center. Dry Weight 4,420lbs!!
This unit features the Rear Entertainment Floorplan with A Kitchen Island, A 50 x 30 Tub Shower, 60 x 80 queen size bed, Full-Height Wardrobe with Washer Dryer Prep. Dry Weight 9,990 lbs!!!

If you're looking for a 5th wheel toy hauler with a 12' cargo area, triple slides, and a bath and half then this may be the one for you!! It features (6) point hydraulic leveling system, dual A/C's with a heat strip in the garage area, 8 function remote control that works the slides, lighted awnings, even an awning on the rear that goes over the rear deck! Fuzion's ramp converts to a patio complete with awning and side railing. The patio is integrated into the ramp door for easy set up. The entertainment center is located in the middle of the coach which makes it easy for everyone to see the 40" Samsung LED TV, the Samsung sound bar, Sony Blue Ray DVD Player and a Sony stereo and it has a beautiful rock fireplace below. The living area is very roomy due to (2) opposing slides. On the main slide features a full size Theater Seating and built in recliners! It also has double tiered bar in the middle which has (2) bar stools, the stainless steel under mount sink with pull down faucet. Plenty of Corian solid surface counter tops and tons of cabinet storage! The Kitchen includes (3) burner stove top, an oven and a 30" residential microwave with an exhaust hood. A 12 cu ft. stainless steel (4) door refrigerator. If you're wanting cabinet space, this floor plan offers that they are all REAL sold Cherry wood, as well with a huge pantry besides the kitchen area with REAL solid Cherry doors! In fact all entry doors are solid cherry doors thru out the coach! It has a reversed side aisle bathroom with a NEO angled shower, porcelain foot flush toilet and a sink with vanity and medicine cabinet. It also has (2) entry doors for the bathroom, which is nice, because it keeps your guest from walking through your bedroom to get to the bathroom. The master bedroom has a walk around, north to south King size bed in the front with a huge wardrobe slide. So many features on the exterior, just to name a few: 5500 Onan Generator, its own fueling station and Frameless Tinted Window, definitely a must see!! Dry Weight 15,180lbs.

This unit features the Rear Bathroom Floorplan with a 30x 36 shower with glass door! It also features A Kitchen Island, a large Pantry Closet as well as a good size linen closet in the bathroom! Oversized Dinette and Tri-fold Sofa. Dry weight 5800lbs!!

This unit features the Rear Living Floorplan with two lounge chairs and end table between the chairs. A big picture window in the rear, tri-fold sleeper sofa and an oversized dinett. The kitchen features a large 9" deep basin sink and pantry closet. A laundry chute in bedroom! Dry Weight 5480lbs!

This unit features the Rear Entertainment Center Floorplan with two opposing slides, two oversized lounge chairs, a tri-fold sleeper sofa and also an oversized dinette. 9" Deep single basin in kitchen. A wardrobe slide in the bedroom, double entry bathroom. Dry Weight 6460lbs!
***SOLD***

This unit features Rear Living Floorplan with A Kitchen Island, and Desk Entertainment Center with Fireplace. The opposing slides give optimal floor space. A 48" x 30" Shower. A Washer and Dryer prep in the Master Closet and a King size Bed. Dry Weight 11,200.

This unit features bunkhouse floor plan with two single bunks in the back on the side, full bathroom and wardrobe. Kitchen features large 9" basin sink. A sofa and large dinette completes the living area, along with a Laundry Chute next to the master bed. Plenty of storage in the unit with pantry closet in kitchen and various cabinetry thru out the unit. Dry Weight 4780lbs.

This unit is perfect for a couples getaway! The floorplan features a Full Bathroom in the Rear, A U-shaped Dinette, Center Entertainment with 26' LCD Tv that swivels around to the Master Bedroom. It also features an Outdoor Kitchen for that outdoor entertainment by the campfire! Dry Weight 4820lbs!

The best-selling floor plan because of it being only 38 feet long, having (3) slide outs, it's a bath and half and it's only a double axle! It also features dual A/C's and are dual controlled and the A/C in the cargo area has a heat strip, it has the (8) function remote control and (6) point hydraulic auto leveling system. The floor plan features the north to south walk around King Size bed with a huge wardrobe slide, a side aisle bathroom with a NEO angled shower with a glass surround, a porcelain foot flush toilet and a sink with vanity and medicine cabinet. You'll really like the way they designed the living area on this, on the door side, you'll find a huge 97" leather sofa which face the 40" LCD TV and below that is a super nice, rocked electric fireplace! Why use up your propane to heat the unit, when you can use the electric fireplace! The Galley (kitchen) has a (3) burner stove stop, an oven, microwave with an exhaust hood and a 8 cu ft. refrigerator it also has an L-shaped solid surface counter top that has stainless sink, and it has several drawers and a ton of storage! It also has a loft bed for extra sleeping room. The cargo area is 11' and has a 19" LCD TV, washer/dryer hook ups, the power beds with opposing couches and half bath. This also has the ramp door patio system with power awning! As you can see, it's got all the bells and whistles! The exterior features are dual lighted awnings, a 5500 Onan generator with a fueling station. It has correct rack, (6) point auto leveling, central vacuum and a sliding rear patio door! Dry Weight 13,320lbs.

This unit features the bunkhouse floor plan with double bed over double bed, full bathroom with 30 x 36 shower. A kitchen island and a large pantry closet. The Entertainment Center includes a 42" TV. Dry weight 6220!!

This unit features Rear Bathroom Floorplan with a seperate entrance door. It also features large dinette, sofa, pantry closet and Large 9" Deep Kitchen Sink. Laundry Chute next to Queen Bed. Dry Weight 4980lbs!!

This unit features Rear Bathroom Floorplan with a seperate entrance door. It also features large dinette, sofa, pantry closet and Large 9" Deep Kitchen Sink. Laundry Chute next to Queen Bed. Dry Weight 4980lbs!!

This unit features the bunkhouse floor plan with double bed over double bed, full bathroom with 30 x 36 shower. A kitchen island and a large pantry closet. The Entertainment Center includes a 42" TV. Dry weight 6180lbs

This 3 Slide unit has the perfect floor plan room for the kids to hang out and plenty of privacy for the parents! Bunkhouse features a slide to give optimal space for hanging out! Plenty of sleeping space with two 32 x 74 bunks and two flip over futons that make the size of a King-size Bed! The living area features two opposing slides with Raised Panel Cabinetry thru out and Wood Grain Residential Stain Resistant Linoleum and LED Puck ceiling lights. A Kitchen Island with retractable kitchen faucet. 8 cu ft Refrigerator. A large radius dinette with Stor-more drawers. A Tri-fold Sofa. A large 42" TV with CD/DVD/AM/FM/MP3 Stereo! The bathroom features two door entry one from the main living area and one from the master bedroom. Progressive interior lighting in master bedroom, as well as Laundry Chute on the left side of the bed, as well as storage underneath the queen bed. A Sold Hardwood Door to close off the Master bedroom for complete privacy! The exterior of unit has so many nice features as well! The Biggest would be the Outdoor Kitchen for that outdoor entertaining! Slam latch pass thru storage doors, the largest in its class! Frameless tinted windows! Electric Adjustable Awning! Rolled roof edge promotes increased water runoff. A 43" wide stance axle greatly reduces sway and bouncing. The enclosed and underbelly eliminates turbulence caused by exposed frame members, holding tanks, plumbing etc., as well as 2" pipe off of furnace with forced air into underbelly, to keep it warm during the winter. Premier has luxury features that matter most in ultra-lites! Dry Weight 7,000lbs.

This 3 Slide unit has the perfect floor plan room for the kids to hang out and plenty of privacy for the parents! Bunkhouse features a slide to give optimal space for hanging out! Plenty of sleeping space with two 32 x 74 bunks and two flip over futons that make the size of a King-size Bed! The living area features two opposing slides with Raised Panel Cabinetry thru out and Wood Grain Residential Stain Resistant Linoleum and LED Puck ceiling lights. A Kitchen Island with retractable kitchen faucet. 8 cu ft Refrigerator. A large radius dinette with Stor-more drawers. A Tri-fold Sofa. A large 42" TV with CD/DVD/AM/FM/MP3 Stereo! The bathroom features two door entry one from the main living area and one from the master bedroom. Progressive interior lighting in master bedroom, as well as Laundry Chute on the left side of the bed, as well as storage underneath the queen bed. A Sold Hardwood Door to close off the Master bedroom for complete privacy! The exterior of unit has so many nice features as well! The Biggest would be the Outdoor Kitchen for that outdoor entertaining! Slam latch pass thru storage doors, the largest in its class! Frameless tinted windows! Electric Adjustable Awning! Rolled roof edge promotes increased water runoff. A 43" wide stance axle greatly reduces sway and bouncing. The enclosed and underbelly eliminates turbulence caused by exposed frame members, holding tanks, plumbing etc., as well as 2" pipe off of furnace with forced air into underbelly, to keep it warm during the winter. Premier has luxury features that matter most in ultra-lites! Dry Weight 7,000lbs.

This used, 2010 Outback 230RS is ideally suited for the active camping family. If you are looking for a light weight toy hauler, this camper is ready to be towed to your favorite playground or riding spot. This floor plan is a favorite with the camping couple who likes to take their cruiser with them to ride the roads of this great country, while spending their evenings relaxing in personal, comfortable surroundings. The Outback 230RS toy hauler takes comfort and style to a whole new level. Vaulted, barreled ceilings and upgraded furniture provide a roominess and sophistication unseen in other light weight trailers. The combination of solid ash interior doors with walnut and hazelnut cabinetry delivers the styling that campers have come to expect from a Keystone Outback. Equipped with a rear slide out king bed with overhead storage and lighting. A window on each side of the slide to give that open feel and a breeze to blow across the bed during those nights that are just right not to hot and not to cold. A side kitchen with more than enough storage for all your camping essentials and must have goodies. Especially when you utilize the large pantry cabinet. The private side bath with tub/shower, linen cabinet, and vanity and foot pedal flush toilet. The booth dinette and sofa both provide additional sleeping space when required for those overnight camping guests. A fifty six inch side ramp door allows you garage access, and a set of flip down bunks provide you with a large, open bunk room up front. This exciting RV is more than a toy hauler, this is a great bunk model camper. If you are looking for a light weight, fuel efficient multipurpose camper, the Outback awaits you! Dry Weight 5,200!!

Here's one of Cougar X-Lite brand new floor plan it features Residential styling and toy hauler function, the new 326 SRX fifth wheel includes amazing amounts of storage, room for your toys or tools and has great features including: 3 TV's, washer/dryer prep, outdoor refrigerator and weighs under 10,000lbs! It has (2) slide outs! It has a walk around queen bed in the front with underneath storage, a wardrobe slide in the master bedroom giving you plenty of extra room! It has a really nice side aisle bathroom with two entry doors one from the master bedroom and another access from the hallway, it also features a NEO angled shower with a glass surround, a sink with a medicine cabinet, and a porcelain foot flush toilet. It has a full kitchen with a (3) burner stove top, an oven, a microwave with an exhaust hood and a nice double door refrigerator with matching Knotty Cherry fronts. The Knotty Cherry fronts match the beautiful Knotty Cherry cabinetry throughout the coach itself. The main living area is very comfortable! It has the large super sofa on a slide that has a free standing dinette table that can be removed, and the sofa is a hide-a-bed sleeper. A 40"LED TV with Bluetooth Stereo includes AM/FM/CD/DVD/MP3/AUX INPUT/USB PORT for entertainment purposes and a Fireplace. Above the Cargo area is a 42 x 92 Loft for additional sleeping, with build in ladder for access. The cargo area consists of Dual Opposing sofas, Washer and Dryer hook ups, TV, hanging hooks for coats and jackets. On the outside of the unit it features the outside entertainment center with a small refrigerator and a 32"LED TV. LED lighted awning. Black tank flush provides a clean and easy solution to cleaning your waste tank. This RV weighs only 9,890lbs which is perfect for most ton trucks or SUVs. It has all upgrades such as the radius interior roof designs (gives more head room), 15K BTU ducted A/C, Aluminum Wheels, Polar Package! Great floor plan for the entire family and Toys!

This unit is perfect for a couples getaway! The floorplan features a Full Bathroom in the Rear, A U-shaped Dinette, Center Entertainment with 26' LCD Tv that swivels around to the Master Bedroom. It also features an Outdoor Kitchen for that outdoor entertainment by the campfire! Dry Weight 4820lbs!

If you're looking for a 5th wheel toy hauler with a 11' cargo area, triple slides,then this may be the one for you!! It features (6) point hydraulic leveling system, dual A/C's with a heat strip in the garage area, 8 function remote control that works the slides, lighted awnings, even an awning on the rear that goes over the rear deck! Fuzion's ramp converts to a patio complete with awning and side railing. The patio is integrated into the ramp door for easy set up. The entertainment center is located in the middle of the coach which makes it easy for everyone to see the 40" Samsung LED TV, the Samsung sound bar, Sony Blue Ray DVD Player and a Sony stereo and it has a beautiful rock fireplace below. The living area is very roomy due to (2) opposing slides. On the main slide features a full size Theater Seating and built in recliners! It also has kitchen island in the middle which has (2) bar stools, the stainless steel under mount sink with pull down faucet. Plenty of Corian solid surface counter tops and tons of cabinet storage! The Kitchen includes (3) burner stove top, an oven and a 30" residential microwave with an exhaust hood. A 12 cu ft. stainless steel (4) door refrigerator. If you're wanting cabinet space, this floor plan offers that they are all REAL sold Cherry wood, as well with a huge pantry besides the kitchen area with REAL solid Cherry doors! In fact all entry doors are solid cherry doors thru out the coach! It has a reversed side aisle bathroom with a NEO angled shower, porcelain foot flush toilet and a sink with vanity and medicine cabinet. It also has (2) entry doors for the bathroom, which is nice, because it keeps your guest from walking through your bedroom to get to the bathroom. The master bedroom has a walk around, north to south King size bed in the front with a huge wardrobe slide. So many features on the exterior, just to name a few: 5500 Onan Generator, its own fueling station and Frameless Tinted Window, definitely a must see!! Dry Weight 15,180lbs.

This unit features a double over double bed bunkhouse! In the bathroom has a tub/shower. The main living area includes a large pantry/wardrobe, and a large deep kitchen sink, oversized dinette and brown saddle leather sofa. Entertainment Center that includes swivel TV for the Master Bedroom as well. Dry Weight 5020lbs!!

Introducing Cougars hottest selling X-Lite 1/2 ton towable 5th wheel floor plan on the planet! Here's the brand new 2015 Cougar High Country X-Lite 28SGS. This 30' 5th wheel has (3) slides, a TON of interior room and weighs only 7720lbs! Plus, this is a High Country edition, so it will have the Taupe exterior fiberglass, frameless windows, the new Thomasville furniture with recliners, a lighted power awning, a Max Air vent with remote, and Corian counter tops!! Some other very nice features are, the radius interior roof, the new Solid Cherry cabinetry, slam baggage doors and more! The 28SGS floor plan has a walk around queen bed in the front with a large wardrobe slide. It has a very private side aisle bathroom with a NEO angled shower, a sink with vanity and medicine cabinet and a porcelain foot flush toilet. The living area in the coach is huge because of the (2) opposing slides. The kitchen is against the bathroom wall which allows for extra room. It has a (3) burner stove top with cover, an oven, a microwave oven with an exhaust hood and a double door refer with the matching Cherry fronts. The slide on the door side has the free standing dinette with (4) chairs and the entertainment center which has a 32" LCD TV and built in pantry. Across from that is the super slide with a tri fold sleeper sofa. In the rear is (2) swivel rocking recliner, with a large picture window and two side windows and end tables on each Here's a list of the options we ordered on this RV. The interior color is Bronze. It has the Cougar High Country package, the X-Lite package, the Convenience package, the Value package, the Camping in Style package AND the Polar package for cold weather camping, 50 amp service, it has the new electric (4) leveling system, the correct track alignment system, the Cougar remote that works the slides, awning, jacks, etc. It has an upgraded 15K BTU ducted roof A/C, an electric fireplace! Dry Weight of unit is only 7,830lbs!!

This gently used bunkhouse features a double on the bottom and a single on top for the bunks. A very nice open feel to the unit with light color interior! A few extra amenties added by previous owner! Definately A Must Look!! Dry Weight 4,350lbs

Very clean Class A Motorhome. New roof in 2014, hydraulic jacks, generator, A/C, Power Step, Microwave, 8 cubic ft. Dometic Refrigerator, and 3-burner stove with oven. Also has a Queen bed, 32" TV, Sofa and Dinette. AMFM Casette This nice pre-owned motorhome is on a Chevy chassis, and has only 34,484 miles on it.
